heading: HB01099
0: AN ACT MANDATING DANGEROUS DRUGS COURTS TO STRICTLY ENFORCE THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT 9165 OR THE COMPREHENSIVE DANGEROUS DRUGS ACT OF 2002 AND TO EFFECT A REDUCTION OF DRUG-RELATED CASES, DECLOGGING OF THE SAME IN COURT'S DOCKETS, AND STREAMLINING THE FIVE PILLARS OF THE CRIMINAL JUSTICE SYSTEM
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01099
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING DANGEROUS DRUGS COURTS TO STRICTLY ENFORCE THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT 9165 OR THE COMPREHENSIVE DANGEROUS DRUGS ACT OF 2002 AND TO EFFECT A REDUCTION OF DRUG-RELATED CASES, DECLOGGING OF THE SAME IN COURT'S DOCKETS, AND STREAMLINING THE FIVE PILLARS OF THE CRIMINAL JUSTICE SYSTEM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-07-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-25
          -Referred the measure for comment to the Philippine National Police Anti-Illegal Drugs Group
      2. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-30
          -Referred the measure for comment to the Philippine Drug Enforcement Agency and the National Bureau of Investigation
      3. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-09-06
          -Referred the measure for comment to the Department of Justice
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DANGEROUS DRUGS ON 2016-08-01
